ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We thank the Wadsworth Center librarians, Ann Lâ€™Hommedieu and Tammy Kelly, for retrieval of archival articles, multimedia group member, Andrew Bentley, for photographic image restoration, Amy B. Dean for providing additional laboratory information and Lawrence Sturman for editorial review and valuable discussions. We also thank Ron Limberger, Stephanie Ostrowski, Donna Gowie, Daniel Kuhles, Michael Primeau and Mark Waldenmaier for editorial comments and helpful suggestions.
